name: Ancient Red Dragon
description: The Ancient Red Dragon is a gargantuan creature with scales that burn like molten lava and smoke rising from its nostrils. It boasts immense power and a fierce, territorial nature.
memorable: Known for its devastating fire breath and overwhelming presence, this dragon embodies the terror of what can happen when greed and superiority are fused into a single creature.
goals: Driven by greed, the Ancient Red Dragon hoards treasure and will defend its territory against intruders vigorously.
relations: Red Dragons are typically solitary, but they may have minions or lesser dragons serving them.
environment: Volcanic mountains, surrounded by treasure hoards.
strengths: High hit points and armor class
Legendary Resistance allowing it to ignore failed saving throws
weaknesses: Below-average Dexterity may expose it to agility-based tactics
Vulnerable to tactics that exploit its high saving throw reliance
attacks: The dragon can use its frightful presence to instill fear, followed by powerful multiattacks including biting, clawing, and tail swipes, along with its devastating fire breath.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath unleashes a massive 90-foot cone of fire that deals high damage and can frighten those caught within it.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive perception score of 26, making it highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Profound skill in intimidation and perception makes it an imposing presence.
additional_information: Legendary actions allow it to make extra attacks or instill fear after other creatures' turns.
Searing Heat causes damage to those who touch it or attack it in melee.
Can cast spells like command and wall of fire without needing material components.
Has the Cruel Tyranny ability to force minions to attack immediately.
Regional effects can manifest in its territory, presenting additional hazards.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with a focus on control and area denial through spells like wall of fire.
